Title: Increases the penalties for stopping, standing, or parking in handicapped spaces without a handicapped permit
Summary: Increases the penalties for stopping, standing, or parking in handicapped spaces without a handicapped permit to not less than one hundred fifty dollars nor more than three hundred dollars for the first offense and three hundred to five hundred fifty dollars for the second offense occurring within a period of five years within the state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to increasing the penalties for stopping, standing, or parking in handicapped spaces without a handicapped permit
